sense.gloss: in a way that is uncharacteristic of ..., in a way that is unbecoming to ..., in a way that is unbefitting of ..., despite one's position as ..., despite being ...

sdata.j: ↑母↑↓かあ↓さんは、↑女↑↓おんな↓|だてらに|↑男↑↓おとこ↓だらけの↑中↑↓なか↓、↑建設↑↓けんせつ↓↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓で↑現場↑↓げんば↓↑監督↑↓かんとく↓をしている。
sdata.e: Mum, a mere woman surrounded by men, works in a construction company as a site foreman.

sdata.j: ↑女↑↓おんな↓|だてらに|↑自転車↑↓じてんしゃ↓に↑乗↑↓の↓るなんてけしからん。↑女↑↓おんな↓は↑男↑↓おとこ↓の↑真似↑↓まね↓はよした↑方↑↓ほう↓がいい。
sdata.e: It's outrageous that you're riding a bicycle even though you're a woman. Women should stop trying to imitate men.
